jobs.title: Senior Developer
jobs.desc: Worked with Devii.io to bring their Figma Mockups into reality using the React Admin framework. Integrated their Graph-QL APIs into a workable prototype and MVP that early adopters are able to use and get valuable early feedback. Helped them structure their frontend site, the build tools, and integration with various design tools & frameworks.

jobs.title: Freelance / Private Contractor
jobs.desc: Built numerous websites for new companies, mostly Wordpress based, some Shopify and related platforms. Also build an Oilfield mapping, crowd-sourced location app. It provided driving directions & oilfield information on Android, iOS and even Garmin GPS devices.

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.desc: Built and maintained company Wordpress sites. Worked in small teams to design and build both public and private customer web apps. Performed various full stack jobs, working with both front and back end libraries, including ReactJS, AngularJS, PHP 7, Docker, Vagrant, Ruby, Bulma, and a few others.

jobs.title: Front End / Mobile Developer
jobs.desc: Revamped both the mobile and desktop websites. Completed a team wide push to modernize the legacy codebase. Tasks also included adding new functionality and designs, with a focus on updating build tools and asset pipelines to reduces page load times and increase security.

jobs.title: Front End / iOS Developer
jobs.desc: Starting with basic concept art, built out and programmed a complex web revolving around in-home service industry professionals. Published an iOS mobile app using AngularJS and Cordova. Integrated multiple payment providers on web and mobile platforms.
